query: mutation CreateRallySprint($rallyNumber: Int!, $sprintLetter: String!, $consortium: String!, $rallyAdminProjectId: String!, $wikiTaskTemplateId: String!, $wikiRallyTemplateId: String!, $allFilesSchemaId: String!, $defaultRallyTeamMembers: [Int]!, $rallyAdminTeamPermissions: [String]!, $sprintFolders: [String]!, $posts: [PostDataInput]!) { createRallySprint(rallyNumber: $rallyNumber, sprintLetter: $sprintLetter, consortium: $consortium, rallyAdminProjectId: $rallyAdminProjectId, wikiTaskTemplateId: $wikiTaskTemplateId, wikiRallyTemplateId: $wikiRallyTemplateId, allFilesSchemaId: $allFilesSchemaId, defaultRallyTeamMembers: $defaultRallyTeamMembers, rallyAdminTeamPermissions: $rallyAdminTeamPermissions, sprintFolders: $sprintFolders, posts: $posts) { rallySprint { synId letter } ok } }

posts.title: test
posts.messageMarkdown: Use this post for a daily check in.
